long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
â˜… Used by Several Million users on different platforms â˜…

Capture the entire web page or specific parts of it. Edit your screenshots with a very user-friendly interface. Record screencasts - record video from your screen.

ğŸš€ Nimble capture will help you to:

âœ” Capture the entire web page or a required section of it
âœ” Capture the entire browser window
âœ” Capture the browser window of other programs
âœ” Quickly capture a site fragment 
âœ” Record video from your screen/tab (Screencasts) 
âœ” Record video from another active program 
âœ” Create your own drawing or model from scratch 
âœ” Paste different patterns and text boxes onto your screenshot
âœ” Resize and crop your screenshot
âœ” Add arrows and stickers to your screenshot 
âœ” Highlight text on your screenshot 
âœ” Save screenshots in: JPG and PNG

Nimble capture supports horizontal scrolling. The editor interface allows editing objects even after you add them to the screenshot

ğŸ“· There are 3 ways to capture your screen:

a) With the button in your address bar;
b) With the context menu;
c) With a hot key that you assign in the program settings.
